title: How To Nail The Impossibly Chic, Modern British Interior Style
description: ​​Kate Moss, the YBAs (Young British Artists), David Bowie, Adwoa Aboah, Glastonbury Festival, Amy Winehouse, and Vivienne Westwood. Combine the above with the UK’s more traditional establishments like The Royal Family, Shakespeare, and afternoon tea, and you’ve got part punk, part posh and all charisma. I think of English interiors similarly: a mix of the cool with the traditional, classic with a twist. The spaces are vibrant, whimsical, unafraid of bright hues, and lived-in with a few glamorous touches. Below, I show you how to get the look!
author: The Design Files
